subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The International Olympic Committee said that the drug-testing program for February’s Winter Olympics in Sochi, Russia, would be the “most stringent” in the history of the Winter Games.
snippet: The International Olympic Committee said that the drug-testing program for February’s Winter Olympics in Sochi, Russia, would be the “most stringent” in the history of the Winter Games.
